Vive en compañía de su esposo Gregorio con quien tiene 8 hijos pero actualmente solo vive con uno de ellos en su casa propia ya que sus hijos mayores son independientes. Se caracteriza por tener un semblante fuerte, ello lo demuestra en su trabajo, pues como buena mujer dedica su tiempo y esfuerzo en la agricultura. Oficio que aprendió desde muy pequeña, y que en la actualidad aprovecha para poder generar ingresos para su familia. Sus principales sembríos constan de maíz y papa. Lo que comercializa a la ciudad de Huancayo y en campaña grande a la capital del país. Como toda mujer entusiasta, ahora desea incrementar sus ganancias y además está ahorrando dinero para poder comprar sus propios terrenos agrícolas, ya que no cuenta con unos propios. Este es el primer crédito con KIVA, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida. Además le gusta pertenecer a su asociación, porque sus integrantes son personas solidarias y trabajadoras. Paula, invertirá los S/.1000 soles en la compra de abono orgánico para sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Paula, 54 years old, is a simple woman.  She lives with her husband Gregorio with whom she has 8 children. Only one of her children, Jairo, lives with them, and she takes care of him in the house they built 6 years ago. Her older children are all independent. She describes herself as having a strong demeanor, which shows in her work, because as a good woman, she puts her time and energy into agriculture.  She learned this trade from a young age and currently uses it to generate income for her family. 

Her main crops are corn and potatoes.  She sells them in the city of Huancayo  and the country's capital.  Like all enthusiastic women, she hopes to increase her earnings and continue to save her money to be able to purchase her own farm land, since currently she does not own her land.  

This is her first loan with Kiva.  She feels happy because she has the necessary funds to improve her business and therefore her quality of life.  She also enjoys being part of her association because its members are caring and hardworking people.  Paula will invest the 1000 Soles in the purchase of organic fertilizer for her crops.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer.

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es:
La Señora. Sandra desde hace algún tiempo forma parte del grupo de crédito Los Talvos, vive por la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, lugar que tiene verdes campos y amplias praderas, es una mezcla de la arquitectura moderna y la antigua, su gente se dedica a la crianza de animales y agricultura, pero siempre están dispuestos a mejora su estabilidad económica con su esfuerzo y trabajo. 
La Señora Sandra tiene 21 años, es casada y tiene un hijo. Su esposo es de profesión mecánico y labora en un taller que es de su propiedad, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en casa de sus suegros y comparten los gastos de la casa.
Doña Sandra desde muy joven se intereso por la costura por lo que estudio y también sus habilidades las desarrollo con mucha práctica, desde hace 1 año es toda una profesional y ahora presta sus servicios desde su casa, realiza una gran variedad de prendas de vestir y también arreglos. 
El dinero de su crédito lo invirtió en la compra de  una maquina de coser, está repitiendo el crédito para implementar otra máquina de coser que le hace falta y así crecer poco a poco en este negocio. Le gusta mucho este grupo ya que más que amigas ya todas son una familia que lucha por un objetivo en común que es el bienestar de sus familias.
texts.en:
Sandra has been part of the Los Talvos loan group for a while. She lives near the parish of Valle in Cuenca, a place that has green fields and broad prairies. It is a mix of modern and ancient architecture. Its people make a living from agriculture and raising animals, but they are always willing to improve their financial stability with their effort and work. 

Sandra is 21 years old, is married and has a son. Her husband is a mechanic and works in a repair shop he owns. They don't have a house of their own because they live with her in-laws and share the living expenses.

From a very young age, Sandra was interested in sewing, so she studied and also developed her abilities with a lot of practice. For the last year she has been a full professional and now she provides her services from her home. She makes a great variety of clothing and also does tailoring. 

The money from her loan has been invested in the purchase of a sewing machine. She is repeating the loan to install another sewing machine that she needs, thus growing in her business bit by bit. She likes this group a lot, as, more than friends, they are all a family that strives for a common objective, which is the well-being of their families.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es: Ruth tiene  47 años, está casada con Lucio y tienen 5 hijos que viven con ella en su casa hecha de material noble que construyó junto a su esposo. Se inicio laboralmente como empleada de un restaurante siendo cocinera por la buena habilidad que posee para la preparación de alimentos y diversos platos mayormente consumidos. Posteriormente e impulsada por el deseo de superación optó por poner su restaurante. Lleva 9 años con su actual negocio que desempeña en una zona concurrida de su localidad y con el paso de los años ha logrado convertirlo en un buen sustento para su economía familiar. Comenta que al inicio no fue  sencillo puesto que el dinero que contaba solo le permitió comprar un horno pequeño lo cual superó posteriormente con la compra de un horno más grande que facilita la obtención de pollos con un sabor agradable como acostumbra preparar según comenta. Es su segundo préstamo con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. En está oportunidad desea contar con 2,000 nuevos soles para la reparación de sus mesas, sillas y compra de gaseosas al por mayor para venderlos en su negocio.
texts.en:
Ruth is 45 years old and is married to Lucio, with whom she has 5 children who live with her in their home made of quality materials, which she built with her husband.  She began working in restaurants as a cook due to her ability to prepare good food and a diverse array of dishes.  Later, driven by her dream of success, she decided to open her own restaurant.  She has had her business for 9 years, and it is located in a busy area of her city.  With time, she has been able to make a good livelihood for her family.

At the beginning, it was not easy for her as she only had enough money to purchase a small oven.  She was later able to improve the restaurant with the purchase of a larger oven which made it easier to make a tastier chicken.  

This is her second loan with Kiva and she is very grateful for the support that she receives to continue to move forward.  She is committed to paying the installments on time.  She will use the 2,000 nuevos soles to repair tables and chairs and purchase soft drinks in bulk to sell in her restaurant.

loans.use: to repair tables and chairs and purchase soft drinks in bulk to sell in her restaurant

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth, de 33 años es una mujer luchadora. Vive en compañía de su esposo Fredy con quien tiene 2 hijos en su casa propia. Todas las mañanas, desde muy temprano tiene que distribuir su tiempo en varias actividades. Durante todo el día se dedica a la venta de verduras y, es muy solicitada por sus clientes. Con 10 años en este negocio desea seguir creciendo para brindarle lo mejor a su familia. En sus tiempos libres se dedica a la agricultura, con la siembra de lechuga, espinaca y alverja; los cuales después de cuidarlos y abonarlos constantemente los comercializa en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad. Ella disfruta de conversar con sus clientes y siempre suelta una broma para llevarse mejor con ellos, ya que su principal estrategia en la vida es la alegría que le pone a todo lo que hace. Por ello está segura que podrá ser una de las mejores agricultoras y comerciante de la zona. Este es el primer crédito con KIVA, se siente feliz, pues tiene el capital necesario para mejorar su negocio y por ende su calidad de vida.  Elizabeth, invertirá los S/.2000 soles en la compra de abono orgánico para sus sembríos.
texts.en: Elizabeth, 33, is a determined woman.  She lives with her husband Fredy and their two children, and they own their house.  Every morning, starting very early, she has to distribute her time between various activities.  Throughout the day she sells vegetables, and is very popular with her customers. With 10 years in this business, she hopes for it to continue growing to bring the best to her family. In her free time she works in agriculture, growing lettuce, spinach, and peas which, after taking care of them constantly, she sells at the wholesale market in the city.  She likes to talk to her customers and always makes a joke to get along with them better, since her main strategy in life is the joy she takes in everything she does.  Because of this she is sure she will be able to be one of the best farmers and sellers in the area.  This is her first Kiva loan and she is happy to have the necessary capital to improve her business and ultimately her quality of life.  Elizabeth will spend the 2,000 PEN on organic fertilizer for her fields.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer

loans.name: Nueva Generación  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El grupo de crédito Nueva Generación está formado por 12 mujeres quienes laboran en diferentes actividades, las mismas que les permiten aportar a  la economía de sus hogares y así sacar adelante a sus familias, su mayor característica es que siempre mantienen una sonrisa a pesar de las dificultades, aun mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus pueblos. Todas viven por los alrededores de la ciudad de Cuenca, esta ciudad se encuentra rodeada de abundante naturaleza, tiene una geografía accidentada, esta bañada y cubierta por 4 ríos, su centro histórico guarda celosamente su historia.
Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. María Esperanza, tiene 42 años de edad, se encuentra casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos mayores de edad, casados que viven independientes, su esposo labora como albañil, la casa en la que vive es arrendada.
Doña María Esperanza para aportar a la economía de su casa se dedica a arreglar casas y los días que no realiza este trabajo lava ropa ajena. 
Su crédito va a invertir en la compra de pollos  para  iniciar con este negocio. Su meta es que su negocio de pollos cresca.
texts.en:
The credit group ‘Nueva Generación’ is made up of 12 women who work in different activities which allow them to contribute to household expenses and support their families. Their most distinguishing characteristics are that they always stay cheerful despite the hardships they face, and that they still maintain the culture and traditions of their villages.  They all live on the outskirts of Cuenca, a city surrounded by nature and mountains on all sides, lush because of the four rivers running through it.  This city’s old town jealously guards its history.  

One of the members of this group is María Esperanza, 42.  She is married and has four grown up children from that marriage, who have all now got married and live independently.  Her husband is a builder and they live in a rented house.

María Esperanza contributes to household expenses by cleaning houses, or when she can’t, she does other people’s laundry.  

She will use the loan to buy chickens to be able to start in this business.  Her goal is to have her chicken business grow.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: La señora Lidia tiene 19 años de edad, es soltera pero vive en concubinato y tiene un hijo, actualmente vive en casa de su tío en calidad de cuidadora en la ciudad de Cochabamba. Alcanzo a estudiar la primaria y su actividad económica es la elaboración y venta de empanadas domésticas de forma ambulante. Se considera trabajadora y responsable y quiere mejorar sus condiciones de vida, para tal efecto se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un crédito para la construcción de un baño sanitario en la casa donde actualmente vive con autorización de su tío.
texts.en: Lidia is 19 years old. She is single but lives with her partner and has one child. She currently lives in her uncle's home as a caretaker in the city of Cochabamba. She was able to complete primary school and she works as a street vendor, making and selling home made empanadas. She considers herself to be a hard worker and a responsible person, and she wants to improve her living conditions. In order to achieve this, she needs to request a loan to build a bathroom in the house where she currently lives with her uncle's permission.

loans.use: to build a bathroom.

loans.name: Yulchi

texts.ru:
Юлчи живет в кишлаке неподалеку от Канибадама, где основной деятельностью жителей является выращивание скота, разведение кур и прочей домашней живности и земледелие. У него 3 детей и на его иждивении находятся пожилые родители. Жена и родители помогают ему в разведении скота и земледелии.  Для содержания своей большой семьи Юлчи подрабатывает на строительстве домов. Его мечта дать достойное образование своим детям. Основным источником дохода его семьи является скотоводство.   Так как наступают холода для приобретения кормов ему нужны дополнительные средства, для этого  знакомые посоветовали ему обратиться в «Арванд».
 Юлчи подал заявку на кредит и на полученный кредит планирует  запастись кормом для скотов  на зиму. Он благодарен , что есть такие организации , которые помогают бедному населению в росте благосостояния.
texts.en: Yulchi lives in a village near Kanibadam, where raising livestock, breeding chickens and other domestic livestock and farming are the primary types of occupations of the local residents.  He has three children and supports his elderly parents.  His wife and parents help him with breeding livestock and farming.  To support his large family, Yulchi works part-time building houses.  His dream is to provide a decent education for his children.  Animal husbandry is the main income source for the family.  Because the cold weather is approaching, he needs additional money, and his friends suggested that he comes to Arvand.  Yulchi requested a loan and wants to use the loan to purchase livestock feed for the winter.  He is grateful that there are organizations that help poor residents with welfare growth.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed for the winter

loans.name: Kuña Aty Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Kuña Aty está en su 2do ciclo, es un grupo muy emprendedor y que fueron creciendo de apoco, y con una expectativa de salir adelante por medio del préstamo y las capacitaciones que reciben.
Zulma es la presidenta, y comenta que siempre trata de motivar a sus compañeras a seguir trabajando y a invertir de una buena manera sus préstamos respectivos. Ella es costurera y pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas e hilos para seguir con sus confecciones.
texts.en:
The group called Kuña Aty is currently in its second loan cycle. It is a very enterprising group that has grown slowly. Its members have an expectation of getting on in life by means of the loan and the payments they receive.

Zulma is the president, who comments that she always tries to motivate her companions to carry on working and to invest well in their respective loans. She is a dressmaker, and is asking for this loan to invest in buying fabric and thread in order to continue making her clothes.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread to use in garments.

loans.name: Nuevo Oriente 1 Group

texts.es: El banco de emprendimiento NUEVO ORIENTE 1, está compuesto por ocho integrantes seis mujeres y dos varones,  todos ellos se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es la señora Rosario la primera en la lista y en la foto la del pantalon rosado y cabello blanco, tiene 52 años y es casada y tiene dos hijos ya mayores,  ella se dedica a la venta y cosméticos, por catálogo, ella vende visitando instituciones públicas y privada d de la ciudad ofreciendo su productos,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  la señora Rosario  va a usar este préstamo  para la compra de cosméticos  al por mayor que se encuentran en promoción ya que tiene muchos pedidos por estas fiestas de fin de año,  la señora Rosario a utilizar los beneficios en seguir mejorando su negocio, su deseo para su negocio es  poder abastecerse  de variedad de  producto ya que tiene mucha venta y es donde tiene que aprovechar para así tener más ingresos económicos, se siente agradecida por esta oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
The communal bank Nuevo Oriente 1 comprises eight members, six women and two men, who all work in different businesses. Rosario is the bank president, the first name on the list and, in the picture, the white-haired lady in pink pants. She is 52 years old, married, and has two adult children. She works selling cosmetics by catalog and also makes sales visiting public and private establishments in the city to offer her products.   

This loan is her first cycle with our organization. Rosario will use this loan to purchase wholesale cosmetics, which are on sale, since she has a lot of orders for the end-of-the-year holidays. Rosario will use her profits to continue improving her business. She wants to stock her business with a variety of products because she is selling a lot and has to make the most of it in order to have more financial income. She is grateful for the opportunity she is being offered.

loans.use: to buy wholesale cosmetics.

loans.name: Filomena

texts.es: La Señora filomena sigue con la misma actividad de la venta de productos de su primera necesidad en su tienda de barrio, cuenta que le fue muy bien con el anterior crédito ya que lo utilizo en la compra de mercadería,  ya que surtió su tienda que cada día está más surtida gracias a los créditos de Kiva , en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería como refrescos por mayor  y así seguir mejorando su negocio y por ende sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Señora Filomena continues selling basic staples in her neighborhood store. She says that everything went very well for her with her previous loan, which she used to purchase merchandise and stock her store. She is able to offer more and more items at her store thanks to Kiva loans. She requests this loan to purchase merchandise, such as beverages, at wholesale prices which will help her improve her business and her earnings.

loans.use: to purchase beverages to stock her shop.

loans.name: Zulfiya

texts.ru: Зулфия 56-летняя женщина из города Вахдат. Она собирается начать швейное дело у себя дома. Она обладает умением шить красивые женские национальные платья. На данный момент у Зулфии имеется старая машинка, на которой трудно шить и к тому же она отнимает много времени. До этого времени Зулфия шила только для себя и членов своей семьи. Теперь она хочет открыть собственное дело и зарабатывать на этом. Она научила своей профессии невестку, которая также будет помогать ей с заказами. Для реализации намеченных планов Зулфия обратилась за кредитом. Она планирует купить компьютерную швейную машинку и ткани. Она очень надеется на поддержку. Благодаря кредиту у нее появится источник дохода.
texts.en: Zulfiya is a 56 year-old woman from the city of Vahdat.  She is planning to start her own sewing business at home.  She knows how to sew beautiful women's dresses.  At the present time, Zulfiya has an old sewing machine that makes it difficult to sew and, besides, it takes a lot of time.  Until this time, Zulfiya sewed only for herself and member of her family.  Now she wants to open her own business and earn money with it.  She taught this business to her daughter-in-law, who will also help her with orders.  To accomplish her set plans, Zulfiya requested this loan.  She plans to purchase a computerized sewing machine and fabrics.  She hopes for the support very much.  Thanks to this loan, she will have a source of income.

loans.use: to purchase a computerized sewing machine and fabrics and start her own business

loans.name: Armen

texts.en:
Armen is 41 years old and he lives in Spitak city which is in the Lori region. He is married and he has two children; his daughter is a student who in the future will have a specialty as an educator, and his son is still school-aged. His wife works at the post office. 

Armen has a business of his own; in a rented shop he sells a great range of car parts. His shop is very popular in his district, because of his shop’s great assortment and low prices. He has been running his business for ten years,  and during those years the number of his loyal customers has grown. 

He asks for a loan of 1,000,000 Armenian drams in order to buy car tires and start to sell them also. He hopes that in this way he will manage to pay for his daughter’s tuition fee and provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy car tires and start to sell them also which will help him to receive a good profit and in this way he will manage to pay for his daughter’s tuition fee

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
Francisca is a  married woman and a mother of four children from Loboc, Bohol. Francisca has been involved in a hog-raising business for several years now. This is the source of her income. 

Francisca is asking for a loan to buy animal feed and additional piglets to raise. With this, she will be able to grow healthy pigs. In the future, Francisca hopes to expand her business and make it a success. Moreover, she wants to save money for their expenses, such as food, and to pay the bills.

loans.use: to buy animal feed and additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
After graduating junior high school, Rebecca decided to set up her own 'kenkey' selling business. (Kenkey is a traditional Ghanaian staple dish that is made from corn dough and is wrapped in banana leaves).  

She prepares her kenkey on her own and proceeds to sell it at Yabiw (near Takoradi). With over four years worth of experience, she is currently looking to expand her enterprise further. Unfortunately, she is limited, due to a lack of funding. As a result, this loan will be used to help her purchase more maize, thus enabling her to prepare and sell more of her tasty kenkey. 


She aims to use the profits from her business to help support her husband (who is a driver) with the upkeep of their house, whilst ensuring that their three children are able to experience a better life.

loans.use: to help her purchase more maize, thus enabling her to prepare and sell more of her tasty ‘kenkey’.

loans.name: Sylvia

texts.en:
Sylvia is a  married woman with five children. She is from Corella, Bohol, and has been in the business for more than five years now. She works hard to support her husband to meet the needs of the family, especially for the education of their children.

Sylvia is asking for a  loan to buy feed for her pigs and additional piglets to raise. She dreams of expanding her business to generate more income so that she will be able to send her children to school to learn and become educated. Moreover, she wants to save money for future use and expenses.

loans.use: to buy feed for her pigs and additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is 47 years old, and she lives in the village of Tsav, which is in the Syunik region. She is married and has three sons. The eldest son is already married, and he lives separately with his family. 

Except for Emma, all the family members are employed; her husband is taxi driver, and her sons also have their work. Emma’s youngest son’s working place is very far from their living place, and it takes much time to reach there.

Emma is asking for a loan of 600,000 Armenian drams in order to buy a car for her youngest son in order to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a car for her youngest son in order to improve his living conditions.

loans.name: Mnyazi

texts.en:
Mnyazi is widowed and has eight children; three are in school and the rest are adults. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

Mnyazi has operated a fish-selling business for the last three years, selling at the market to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. 

With the 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES), she wants to purchase fish, cooking oil, and firewood for her business. She decided to join Yehu to acquire financial services for her business.

loans.use: to purchase fish, cooking oil, and firewood for her business.

loans.name: Veronicah

texts.en:
Veronicah appreciates her previous Kiva loan that improved her living standards and enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income.

She is requesting a loan of KES 50,000 to purchase threads, fabrics, and other materials for the business . She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase threads, fabrics, and other materials for the business

loans.name: Mahina

texts.ru: Махина молодая и очень активная девушка в возрасте 24 лет. Она замужем, но пока не имеет детей. Живёт вместе со своим мужем в маленькой деревушке. С юного возрасте была предприимчивой и способной девушкой. Всегда находила себе занятие или работу, которая приносила ей прибыль, и она могла тратить денежные средства на свои нужды. Она нашла продовольственную точку и начала свой бизнес. Её товар состоял из разных детских принадлежностей, игрушек и некоторых сладостей. Поначалу у Махины был маленький ассортимент товара, но постепенно она расширяла ассортимент своего товара. И на сегодня её бизнес успешен и приносит ей хороший доход. Благодаря своему стремлению и желанию работать Махина хочет расширить свой бизнес, но для этого своего капитала не хватает. Поэтому она решила обратится в Арванд и хочет получить кредит, чтобы закупить партию детских игрушек для дальнейшей продажи. Махина надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Mahina is a young and very active woman, who is 24 years old.  She is married, but does not yet have children.  She lives with her husband in a small village.  Since young age, she has been entrepreneurial and capable young woman.  She always found an occupation or work that yielded a profit and was able to spend money for her needs.  She found a grocery outlet and started her own business.  Her merchandise consists of various children's goods, toys and some sweets.  At first, Mahina had a small selection of goods, but she gradually expanded her selection.  Today, her business is successful and brings her a good income.  Thanks to her drive and desire to work, Mahina wants to expand her business, but does not have enough money.  This is why she decided to come to Arvand and wants to obtain a loan to purchase an inventory of children's toys for future sale.  Mahina hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand for the support in advance.

loans.use: to purchase an inventory of children's toys for future sale

loans.name: Khvicha

texts.en:
Khvicha is 49 years old and lives in the village of Meskheti, West Georgia. He is married and lives with his wife, three children, and retired mother. Khvicha’s elder children are university attendants and the youngest goes to the local school. 

Khvicha breeds six cows and his wife makes cheese with the received milk. The cheese is sold locally and this is the only income source for them. In order to increase his funds, Khvicha decided to apply for this loan and start the greenhouse business. He is very grateful for the support that the Kiva lenders are offering him, since thanks to their help he will be able to purchase all the needed materials for his greenhouse construction. 

He plans to grow various greens in wintertime and plant tomatoes in summer. He will sell his harvest the whole year and generate income. Thanks to this loan, he will improve the quality of life of his family members and cover the tuition fees of his children. Khvicha and his spouse wish their children to have an education with the hope of a better economic future than theirs.  The family awaits your support.

loans.use: to construct a greenhouse

loans.name: Aram

texts.en:
Aram is from Yerevan, where he lives with his parents. It is already four years that Aram has been engaged in sweets delivery. He loves his job and works very hard in gathering income for his family. 

Unfortunately, the income from this activity is hardly enough for covering basic costs, so there is no money left for Aram to be able to purchase new stock of sweets for delivering to his clients. This is the reason why Aram has applied for this loan. 

Aram has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. 

The loan is very important for Aram to sustain his family.

loans.use: to pay for new stock of sweets for delivering to his clients.

loans.name: Edita Cecilia

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Bienestar y Progreso se reúne cada quince días en Colorado del Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Edita, tiene 34 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de  11 y 7 años los mismos que estudian en colegio y escuela. Su esposo es comerciante
Doña Edita tiene una tienda en su casa, vende todo tipo de productos, como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, legumbres, verduras y frutas,  trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde. Ella utiliza el crédito para invertir en su tienda y también le ayuda a su esposo en su negocio, el tiene un tanquero en el cual abastece de agua a varias empresas en la ciudad de Manta. Ella tiene 4 años su tienda la cual se gana algo  y está al tanto de las necesidades de sus pequeños. 
Ella está repitiendo el crédito ya que con ellos es que ella surte aun más su tienda, sus ganancias las emplea en las necesidades de sus hijos. Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar toda clase de víveres y agua. Está en el Banco Comunal hace más de 4 años y le gusta por la unión del grupo. Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y que su tienda crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
The communal bank Bienestar y Progreso meets biweekly in Colorado, in the canton of Montecristi, which is known for its rich precolonial culture and its nationally and internationally renowned arts and crafts. It is home to the famous Panama hat. 

This is where Edita lives. She is 34 years old, married, and has two children from this relationship, who are ages eleven and seven and are both in school. Her husband works in sales.

Edita has a store in her home where she sells all kinds of products, like rice, sugar, oil, detergent, legumes, vegetables, and fruit. She works every day from 6:00 am to 8:00 pm and sometimes even later. She will use this loan to invest in her store and also to help her husband with his business. He has a tank truck he uses to supply several companies in the city of Manta with water. She has had her store for four years. It helps her make some money while she takes care of her little ones.

She uses her loans to further stock her business, and uses her profits to meet her children's needs. She will use this loan to stock her business even further by purchasing all kinds of grocery items and water. She has belonged to her communal bank for over four years and enjoys it because of the group's unity. Her goal is to keep her business going and for her store to keep growing more every day.

loans.use: to buy grocery items and water.

loans.name: Neda

texts.es: La señora Neda, tiene 30 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos, alcanzo a estudiar la primaria, vive en su propia casa la cual se halla situada en la ciudad de Cochabamba. Se dedica a la elaboración y venta de empanadas domésticas ambulando en el mercado principal de la ciudad. Es una persona trabajadora y responsable que quiere mejorar sus condiciones de vida por lo cual se ve en la necesidad de solicitar un crédito para la construcción de una vivienda en su propio lote de terreno y de esta manera tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Neda is 30 years old. She is married and has two children. She was able to go to primary school. She lives in her own house, which is located in the city of Cochabamba. She works making and selling homemade empanadas. She sells as a street vendor in the main market of the city. She is a hardworking and responsible person who wants to improve her living conditions. To do that she needs to ask for a loan to build a house on her own plot of land to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to build a house.

loans.name: Nason

texts.en:
Nason, 54, is an entrepreneurial businessman with six children from Nyimba District, Zambia. He currently runs a poultry farm and transport business. He is asking for a Kiva loan to buy a maize milling machine and a maize de-huller so that he can provide a milling service to over 450 families in his community. 

The maize milling machine takes raw maize (corn) and creates a maize flour which is the staple food in Zambia. Most families in Nason’s community grow maize on their small farms and store it and use it as their primary supply of food for the year. After the kernels are removed from the cob, they then have to be milled to create flour, which can then be boiled and thickened to make what is locally called Nshima. The addition of a maize de-huller creates a further refined flour that is in high demand throughout the region. 

Rent-to-Own has done extensive research in Nason’s community and has determined that the location for this equipment is ideal. The closest competitor is 2km away, but is often broken down, and since most clients walk or use their bicycles to travel to the maize mill, it is certain they will prefer to use this maize mill rather than traveling a longer distance. The addition of a maize de-huller is an extra attraction as those wanting the more refined maize flour will be able to have the processing done in the same place as they have their maize milled. This will also draw customers from neighboring communities.

The high cost of equipment such as a maize mill is  a major barrier, even for successful entrepreneurs like Nason. Once he secures a loan, Nason will be able to get both a maize mill and a de-huller from Rent-to-Own, which will deliver the equipment to his community, as well as provide training on how to use and maintain it. 

With this maize mill and de-huller, Nason will be positioned to offer the only one-stop shop for maize milling in the area. He hopes to hire an additional employee to help with the day-to-day operation of the equipment. This loan will help Nason build on his successes as an entrepreneur and build up what will surely be a viable business that can provide a much needed service throughout the year.

loans.use: To obtain a maize de-huller and milling machine

loans.name: Inmaculada Group

texts.es:
Inmaculada es un grupo de ciudad del este, donde todas las integrantes vienen trabajando juntas hace 16 ciclos, ellas son mujeres muy entusiastas, que también están formando parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, para poder conocer la situación en la que cada una está.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra.  Jessica, quien en su  encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo que quiere decir que tiene pocos ingresos y que tiene que seguir trabajando y luchando. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que vende frazadas de distintas clases y que pide de este crédito para poder comprar una buena cantidad de frazadas para su reventa.  A parte de las capacitaciones correspondientes y de los seguimientos también hemos hecho un plan de negocio así para que puedan tener un mejor control de sus ganancias.
texts.en: Inmaculada is a group from the city of Este, where all of the members have been working together for 16 cycles. They are very enthusiastic women, that are also part of the program for the elimination of poverty. They participated in the survey for the elimination of poverty so they could learn about their own situations. One of the members is Jessica. In her survey, she had a level of poverty at level one, which means that she has little income and that she needs to keep working and fighting. Among the work she does, she sells different types of blankets and she asks for this loan so that she can buy a large amount of blankets for resale. As part of relevant trainings and follow-ups, they have also made a business plan so that they can have better control over their earnings.

loans.use: to purchase blankets for resale.

loans.name: Nigorakhon

texts.ru: Нигорахон 31 летняя жительница городка Истаравшан. Она замужем и имеет двоих сыновей. Истаравшан для нее значит многое. Здесь находятся самые близкие для нее люди, и здесь она занимается бизнесом. Нигорахон со своей семьей занимаются выпечкой лепешек. Почти 5 лет выпечка лепешек для нее стало настоящим семейным бизнесом. В основном ей помогает ее муж. Они вместе выпекают и сдают лепешки оптом на продажу. Так как Нигорахон и ее муж честные люди и любят свою работу, они поддерживают стандарт качества и их лепешки являются самыми вкусными и лакомыми. Нигорахон хочет расширить малый бизнес и построить еще один печь. Тогда они смогут печь лепешки 2 раза больше и соответственно иметь больше дохода. Часть кредита пойдет на ремонт дома. Уже много лет Нигорахон не может сделать ремонт, потому что не хватает средств. В Таджикистане зимой очень холодно, летом очень жарко. Дома чаще нуждаются в ремонте. Нигорахон заранее благодарить Вас за помощь!
texts.en: Nigorakhon is a 31 year-old resident of the city of Istaravshan.  She is married and has two sons.  Istaravshan means a lot to her.  This is where all of the closest to her people are, and this is where she is involved in business.  Nigorakhon and her family are involved in baking flatbread.  Almost 5 years of baking flatbread became a real family business for her.  Her husband mainly helps her.  They bake together and supply flatbread wholesale for sale.  Because Nigorakhon and her husband are honest people and love their work, they uphold a quality standard and their flatbread are the tastiest and delectable.  Nigorakhon wants to expand her small business and build another oven.  Then they will be able to make twice as much flatbread and thus have more income.  The portion of the loan will go toward repairing their house.  Nigorakhon has not been able to make repairs for many years because she did not have enough money.  It is very cold in Tajikistan in the winter and very hot in the summer.  Houses often need repairs.  Nigorakhon thanks You in advance for the help!

loans.use: to build an oven and repair her house

loans.name: Malika

texts.ru: Mалика добрая и порядочная женщина. Она родилась в 1972 года. Малика воспитывает прекрасную дочь. Ее дочь еще не совершеннолетняя. Она мать одиночка. Ее муж умер несколько лет назад, и она осталась с одной маленькой дочкой. Малика более 18 лет занимается купле продажей фруктов на местном рынке. Она продает все виды фруктов. Малика имеет свою торговую точку. Она очень общительная женщина и делает индивидуальный подход каждому клиенту. Малика хочет пополнить свой оборотный капитал. Малика запрашивает займ на сумму 1400 долларов США для покупки мандарин, апельсин, банан, ананас и т.п. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Malika is a kind and decent woman. She was born in 1972. Malika is raising a beautiful daughter. Her daughter is not yet an adult. Malika is a single mother. Her husband died several years ago, and she was left with a small daughter. Malika has more than 18 years of experience buying and selling fruit at the local market. She sells all kinds of fruit. Malika has her own stall. She is a very sociable woman and approaches every customer individually. Malika wants to replenish her working capital. Malika is asking for a loan $1,400 to buy fruit including bananas, tangerines, oranges, and pineapples.She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: buy fruit including bananas, tangerines, oranges, and pineapples.

loans.name: Rafaela Dalila

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Bienestar y Progreso que se reúne cada quince días en Colorado del Cantón Montecristi , conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Rafaela, tiene 45  años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos de 12 y 10 años de edad, el mayor  estudia en colegio y el menor en escuela. El marido es mecánico automotriz. 
Doña Rafaela es un ama de casa que para obtener sus propios recursos se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo y productos de Yanbal (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Su forma de venta es puerta a puerta,  trabaja cuatro días a la semana más que todo por las mañanas ya que a esa hora sus hijos están en la escuela y puede realizar sus recorridos con más comodidad, deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada semana. Tiene 6 años que se dedica a esta actividad la cual le permite salir adelante.
Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos, pantalones, blusas, entre otras prendas de vestir. Lleva años  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque con el primer crédito empezó su negocio que hoy le da muchas ganancias. Sus sueños son tener una boutique.
texts.en:
El Banco Comunal Bienestar y Progresso (Communal Bank of Progress and Wellbeing) meets every 15 days in Colorado del Cantón Montecristi, an area known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for the artisan crafts that are recognized nationally and internationally. It is the home of the famous Panama hat.

This is where Rafaela lives, she is 45 years old, has a common-law relationship from which she has two children, 12 and 10 years old. The older one is in high school and the younger attends elementary school, her husband is an auto mechanic.

Rafaela is a stay at home mother but in order to earn her own income, she sells clothes of all types and Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume, and women's accessories). She goes door to door four days a week, mostly weekday mornings because that is when her children are in school and she can make her trips more comfortably. She sells on cash and credit, and delivers her products every fifteen days.

For the past 6 years she has been involved in this business which allows her to get ahead. 
This loan is to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, pants, blouses, and other garments. She has been with the community bank for years and likes it because with her first loan she started her business which today is very profitable. She dreams of one day having a boutique.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams, cosmetics, pants, shirts and other apparel.

loans.name: Herver Adán

texts.es:
Herver es un joven de 20 años de edad, que estudio hasta quinto grado,  pues su situación económica en su familia no le permite seguir estudiando; por eso mejor prefirió trabajar y cultivar la tierra para obtener un ingreso económico.  Él es soltero, vive en su vivienda con sus papas y 2 hermanos menores que él.

Él junto a su padre cultivan la tierra, en la siembra de granos básicos (maíz y frijol), él desde muy pequeño su padre le ha enseñado a trabajar y a cultivar la tierra, él también se dedica a los trabajos de jornalero ganando $5.00 diarios, que es otra fuente de ingreso para él y su familia para poder salir adelante. Para llegar al lugar de cultivo, tiene que caminar un kilómetro a unos 15 minutos de su vivienda y poder desarrollar sus actividades en su cultivo, junto a su padre y demás  hermanos que lo apoyan.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar una vaca lechera, que le proporcione alimentos para su familia, era un deseo que tenía desde hace un tiempo de tener una vaca lechera, el préstamo le ayudara pues a tener más alimentos para su familia y ya no tener que comprar los derivados de la leche. 

En un futuro, desea seguir estudiando y lograr sacar una carrera universitaria todo esto dice que lo lograra con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo, también desea tener más vacas productoras de leche, que le generen buenos ingresos económicos y que su familia tenga una mejor calidad de vida en un lugar más digno para vivir.
texts.en:
Herver is a 20 year old man who went to school up to the fifth grade. The financial situation in his family didn't allow him to keep going to school. That is why he preferred to work and cultivate the land to obtain an income. He is single and lives in his house with his parents and 2 younger siblings. 

He works the land with his father, growing basic grains (corn and beans). Since he was very young his father has taught him to work and cultivate the land. He also works as a day laborer, making $5.00 a day. This is another source of income for him and his family to be able to get ahead. To get to his crop land, he has to walk a kilometer for about 15 minutes from his house to be able to do his farming activities with his father and the other siblings who help him. 

The loan he is asking Fundación Campo for is to buy a dairy cow that will supply food for the whole family. He has wanted to have a dairy cow for some time. The loan will help him to have more food for his family and not have to buy dairy products anymore. 

In the future, he wants to keep going to school and be able to graduate from college. He says he wants to have more milk producing cows to generate him better income so his family will have a better quality a life and a more worthy place to live.

loans.use: to buy a dairy farm.

loans.name: Mirna

texts.es: Doña Mirna, tiene 63 años de edad, es casada, tiene 3 hijos, y reside en el municipio de Puerto Cortes. ella se ha dedicado a las labores de su casa y hace casi 5 años que decidió tener una fuente de ingresos y se ha dedicado a vender especias como cominos, pimienta, clavo de olor, canela, anís en ristras, también vende agua en bolsa, helados, refrescos y otros. Ya ha invertido dos préstamos al negocio y actualmente solicita el tercer ciclo el cual es por 8,000 Lempiras y los invertirá en la compra de más productos de agua en bolsa, refrescos, azúcar para hacer pilones (helados) y especias o condimentos para surtir el negocio y vender. Su plan es que el negocio se mantenga activo y que crezca en clientes para obtener mayores ingresos.
texts.en: Mirna is 63 years old. She is married, has three children, and lives in the town of Puerto Cortes. She was always a homemaker, but almost five years ago she decided to find a source of income and has been selling spices like cumin, pepper, cloves, cinnamon, and bunches of anise. She also sells bagged water, ice cream, soft drinks, and other items. She has already invested two loans in her business and is currently requesting her third cycle, which is for 8,000 lempiras. She will invest this in purchasing more products: bagged water, soft drinks, sugar to make pilones (popsicles), and spices to stock her business and sell. Her plan is for her business to stay active and attract more customers in order to obtain higher income.

loans.use: to buy spices, soft drinks, bags of water, and sugar to stock her business.

loans.name: Divino Niño Group

texts.es:
Divino Niño está en su quinto ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas están trabajando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Elva, quien se dedica a la venta de prendas de todo tipo, y también a la venta de bebidas en general. Es una persona muy trabajadora y se nota, ya que hace todo tipo de trabajos para poder ayudar a su familia y poder mejorar sus ingresos día a día.
La Sra. Solicita de este crédito para la compra los ingredientes para la venta de sus comestibles, ya que quiere poder implementar también la venta de comidas lo cual le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos, y seguir luchando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Divino Niño (Divine Child) is in its fifth loan cycle of the "committee of women" program, where they all are working to improve their living conditions and that of their families.

One of the members Elva, sells beverages and all types of clothing. She is a very hard worker and does many types of work to help her family and to improve their daily income.

Elva is requesting this loan to buy ingredients for the production of food dishes to expand her business. This will help her improve her profits and continue fighting as she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy supplies to implement food sales.

loans.name: Madinabony

texts.ru: Мадинабону заботливая мать 6 детей. Она разведена и сама обеспечивает своих детей. Ее муж не помогает по обеспечению детей. Мадинабону раньше занималась шитьём женской одежды, но так как ее доход был маленьким, и не хватало для обеспечения 6 детей, она начала свой бизнес 3 года назад купле продажей женской одежды. Она сама ездит в Турцию и Китай за товаром. Она покупает товар оптом и реализует в розницу. Она имеет свою торговую точку. Мадинабону постепенно год за годом развевает бизнес. Она хочет пополнить оборотный капитал для нового сезона, для того, чтобы привлечь больше клиентов. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 долларов США для покупки женской одежды. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие. Этот займ поможет ей получить больше дохода и  улучшить условию проживания.
texts.en: Madinabony is the caring mother of six children. She is divorced and she supports the children. Her husband does not help provide for the children. Madinabony used to work making women's clothes, but she didn't make enough money to support six children, so she started her business buying and selling women's clothing three years ago. She travels to Turkey and China herself to buy goods. She buys goods wholesale sells them retail. She has a shop. Madinabony increases her business every year. She wants to replenish her working capital for the new season in order to attract more customers. She is requesting a loan of $3,000 to buy women's clothing. She is waiting for your kindness and hopes for your mercy. This loan will help her get more income and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: buy women's clothes

loans.name: Fante

texts.en: Although she has received no prior formal education, Fante is an entrepreneur. She processes and sells palm oil. She can be found selling palm oil at Yabiw (near Takoradi). She has been involved in this enterprise for fifteen years. She is married and has five children. Her husband works as a farmer. The proceeds from her palm oil business normally go towards helping her husband cover the family’s general expenses and pay their children’s school fees. Fante will use the loan to purchase palm fruit in bulk, thus aiding her to improve her overall production. With the new profits from her expanded business, she plans to further diversify the type of products that she sells, hence adapting to changing customer demands.

loans.use: to purchase palm fruit in bulk, thus aiding her to improve her overall production.

loans.name: Alijon

texts.ru: Аличон добродушный и жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 35 лет. Он женат, но к сожалению пока не имеет детей. Поэтому всю свою душу он вкладывает в свою работу. Аличон живёт со своей женой в небольшом доме в сельском посёлке. Чтобы прокормить свою семью он занимается своим бизнесом. Аличон занимается деканством и животноводством. У него имеется  земельная площадь. Из общей площади земли, некоторая часть земли составляет богарные земли, а остальная площадь это поливные земли.  На этой земле  Аличон занимается выращиванием моркови, картошки и зерновых культур. А его жена помогает ему ухаживать и растить скот.  Так как земельная площадь у них большая, они также пасут на ней своих скот. Бизнес животноводства приносит хороший доход, поэтому Аличон хочет расширить этот бизнес, увеличив поголовье своего скота. Для этого он обратился в Арванд, чтобы получить кредит на покупку скота. Аличон заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Alijon is a kind and happy man, who is 35 years old.  He is married, but unfortunately does not yet have children.  This is why he pours his whole soul into his work.  Alijon lives with his wife in a small house in a village.  He is involved in his own business to support his family.  Alijon is involved in farming and animal husbandry.  He has land.  Some of the land is rainfed and the rest is irrigated.  Alijon is involved in growing carrots, potatoes and cereal crops on this land.  And his wife helps him to take care and raise livestock.  Because their land is large, they also take their livestock to a pasture there.  The animal husbandry business yields a good income, and this is why Alijon wants to expand this business by increasing livestock headcount.  He came to Arvand for this purpose to obtain a loan and buy livestock.  Alijon thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Furkat

texts.ru: Фуркат жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина. Он женат и имеет шестерых детей. Сыновья Фурката работают в России строителями и зарабатывают хороший доход. Каждый месяц они высылают некоторые денежные средства своим родителям. Фуркат живёт со своей женой в небольшом доме в сельском посёлке. Чтобы прокормить свою семью он также занимается своим бизнесом. Фуркат занимается животноводством. У него имеется земельная площадь. На этой земле он пасёт своих скот. Фуркат вот уже как 5 лет сотрудничает с Арванд. Он является ответственным клиентом и своевременно выплачивает обязательства по своему кредиту. Жена Фурката помогает ему развивать этот бизнес, она  ухаживает и растит скот, а также продаёт молоко, полученное от этого скота. Бизнес животноводства приносит хороший доход, поэтому Фуркат хочет расширить этот бизнес, увеличив поголовье своего скота. Для этого он обратился в Арванд, чтобы получить кредит на покупку скота. Фуркат надеется на положительный результат и  заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Furkat is a cheerful and hardworking man. He is married and has six children. Furkat's sons are working in Russia and make decent money. Every month they send some money to their parents. Furkat lives with his wife in a small house in a rural village. To feed his family, he also runs his own business. Furkat is involved in animal husbandry. He has some land. On this land he grazes his cattle. Furkat has been working with Arvand for five years now. He is a responsible client and makes his payments on time. Furkat's wife helps him run this business. She cares for and raises cattle and sells milk. This livestock business brings in a good income, so Furkat wants to expand the business by increasing his herd. For this, he turned to Arvand to get a loan to purchase cattle. Furkat is hoping for a positive result, and thanks Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: purchase livestock

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en: Catherine is a 43-year-old married woman. She has 6 children with ages ranging from 9 years to 19 years. She describes herself as social. She operates a farm where she grows crops. She describes her family challenge to be lack of sufficient capital to purchase a water tank. She will use the Kes 15,000 loan to buy a water tank to store clean water for domestic use. She hopes that in the future, she will improve living standards of her family. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a water tank

loans.name: Virgenia

texts.en:
Virgenia is 56 years old and lives in Pan-ay, Clarin, Philippines. She is married and has three children.
 
To earn a living, Virgenia has a business selling dried fish in the local market. She earns about PHP 8,500 each month doing this type of work. Virgenia has  requested a loan to purchase additional dried fish to sell.

Virgenia has been a member of PMPC for five years.  In the future, Virgenia would like to start another business.

loans.use: to purchase additional dried fish to sell.

loans.name: María Paula

texts.es:
María de 68 años de edad, se dedica al comercio, está acompañada y su pareja le ayuda atendiendo el  negocio, ella no tuvo hijos, pero tiene a su responsabilidad dos niñas,  hijas de dos sobrinas que emigraron a Estados Unidos, teniendo ella que cuidarlas como hijas propias. La señora estudio hasta octavo grado, ella dice se siente afortunada de haber podido llegar a estudiar hasta allí, con lo difícil que era estudiar en su época.  Lo poco que estudio le ha servido en su  negocio.

Ella se dedica al comercio, tiene un pequeño negocio en su casa (tienda), donde vende comestibles, golosinas, bebidas ropa,  y otros artículos más. Tiene unos 35 años de trabajar en esto, junto a su compañero decidieron dedicarse a este negocio y con ello han venido pasando los años.  En el negocio le ayuda su compañero de vida.

El préstamo que está solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para surtir su tienda, ya que por problemas personales(enfermedad) ha efectuado gastos no previstos y ya se acerca la época navideña, que es buena para invertir ya que hay mucha demanda en el negocio.

Necesitan capital de trabajo para aprovechar la oportunidad, que se les presenta y obtener mejores ingresos en su actividad productiva.

Desea que su negocio se mantenga y que de ahí puedan seguir obteniendo recursos, que les sirvan para cubrir sus necesidades básicas y que a las niñas no les falte nada en el futuro.
texts.en:
María is 68 years old and is engaged in commerce. She is in a relationship and her partner helps her with the business. 
She has no children of her own, but is responsible for two girls, the daughters of two nieces who emigrated to the United States. She looks after these girls as if they were her own daughters. 

María went to school through eighth grade and feels fortunate to have been able to have studied that long, as it was very difficult to do so in those days. What little she was able to complete has helped her in her business.

She has a small business in her home (a shop), selling groceries, sweets, beverages, clothing and other items. 
She has been in this line of work for about 35 years. She and her partner decided to pursue this business and have been passing the years in this way. Her life partner helps her with he business.

The loan she is asking for is to stock her shop. Because of personal problems (illness)  she has had unanticipated bills and as the Christmas season approaches, it is good to invest as there is a lot of demand in the shop.

They need the working capital to take advantage of the opportunity presented to them and make better profits from their business.

She would like to maintain her business and be able to continue obtaining resources which enable them to meet their basic needs so the girls are not lacking for anything in the future.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Murubat

texts.ru: Мурубат жизнерадостная и трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем и имеет детей. У неё очень дружная семья. Живут они в сельской местности. Чтобы иметь доход в семье, Мурубат вместе со своим сыном работают и приносят доход в семью. Каждый трудится как может. Муж Мурубат не работает, он является пенсионером. Сын Мурубат работает плотником в местной мастерской и получает средний заработок. Основным и стабильным бизнесом Мурубат является животноводство. Она разводит и продаёт скот. В этом деле ей также помогают другие её дети. Они ухаживают за скотом, а также продают полученное от скота молоко. Бизнес животноводства приносит Мурубат хороший и стабильный доход. Поэтому она желает расширить этот бизнес. Ей необходимо купить ещё несколько голов скота для выращивания и дальнейшей продажи. Для этого Мурубат обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Она надеется, что этот бизнес будет успешно расширяться и приносить больше прибыли, чтобы качественно удовлетворять нужды семьи. Мурубат заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Murubat is a happy and hardworking woman.  She is married and has a few children. She comes from a very friendly family, and they all live in the countryside.   Both Murabat and her son work in order to provide for the family and to bring some money home.  Everyone else helps as much as they can. 

Murubat's husband is retired, and therefore not working.  While Murabat's son works as a carpenter in a local shop and makes an average income, Murubat's main activity is animal husbandry.   She raises and sells livestock, an activity which is quite stable.   Her other children also help her with her work, taking care of the animals and selling the milk that they produce.  Murubat's animal husbandry business brings a good and stable income, which is the reason why she is now thinking of expanding her activity.  

Murubad needs to buy a few more head of cattle for further breeding and resale.  For this purpose, she has turned to Arvand and would like to receive a loan to purchase some livestock.  She hopes to successfully expand her business in order to make more profits and adequately meet the needs of her family.  She thanks Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Phylis

texts.en: Phylis is a 37-year-old married woman. She has 3 children with ages ranging from 10 years to 13 years. She describes herself as social and self reliant. She operates a farm where she grows crops and keeps livestock to earn a living. She describes her family challenge to be lack of sufficient capital to purchase a water tank. She will use the Kes 15,000 loan to buy a water tank to store clean water for domestic use. She hopes that in the future, the water tank will improve living standards of her family. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy a water tank

loans.name: Ididbek

texts.ru:
Этому мужчине 31 год. Его зовут Идидбек. Он со своей женой и детьми проживает в маленьком городке Нурек. Многие молодые юноши и мужчины Таджикистана оставляют свои родные края и уезжают заграницу из-за отсутствия рабочих мест и чтобы прокормить своих семей.
    Идидбек в своем городке нашел работу, он работает мясником. Идидбек выбрал это занятие потому, что его братья занимались такой деятельностью и с радостью научили его. Семья Идидбека занимается выращиванием скота, что обеспечивает работу Идидбеку. Он сам разделывает скотов и продает их мясо в своем мясном будке . У него всегда можно найти свежее мясо. 
   На данный момент  Идидбеку нужен кредит. Ему не хватает средств, чтобы купить скотов. По этой причине он обратился за кредитом.
texts.en:
This man is 31 years old. His name is Ididbek. He and his wife and children live in the small town of Nurek. Many young men from Tajikistan leave their homeland and go abroad because there aren't jobs to support their families.  

Ididbek found a job in his town. He works as a butcher. Ididbek chose this occupation because his brothers were butchers and taught him. Ididbek's family raises cattle, then Ididbek does his job. He cuts up the cattle and sells the meat in his butcher's stall. He can always find fresh meat. 

Currently Ididbek needs a loan. He does not have enough money to buy cattle. For this reason, he applied for a loan.

loans.use: buy cattle

loans.name: Shuhrat

texts.ru: Шухрат начинающий предприниматель. Ему 30 лет. Он женат и живет с родителями, женой, трехлетней дочерью и двухлетним сыном в Яванском районе. Шухрат собирается начать торговый бизнес. Его стартовый капитал составляет 1000 долларов США. Он уже приобрел торговую точку на рынке и теперь хочет закупить коллекцию зимней одежды и заняться торговлей. Для реализации цели Шухрат запрашивает кредит на сумму 3000 долларов США. Он планирует привезти товар с оптового рынка города Душанбе и продавать на рынке своего района по розничной цене. Сейчас Шухрат нигде не работает. Он всецело поглощен открытием нового бизнеса. Он уже давно мечтает иметь свой бизнес и движется к цели. Шухрат просит дать ему шанс!
texts.en:
Shuhrat is an aspiring entrepreneur.  He is 30 years old, married, and lives with his parents, his wife, his 3-year-old daughter and 2-year-old son in the Yavan district of Tajikistan.  

Shuhrat is planning to launch a new business.  He has an initial capital of 1,000 US dollars and has already bought a retail outlet at the market.  He now wants to buy an assortment of winter clothes and to start  working as a market vendor.  To reach his goal, he is requesting a loan of 3,000 US dollars.  He plans to bring in bulk merchandise from Dushanbe and resell his goods at retail prices at his local market.  

Shurhat is not currently employed, but fully focused on starting his new business.  Having his own business and moving towards the goals he has set for himself has always been his dream.  He is just asking for someone to give him a chance!

loans.use: to buy winter clothes to start his business.

loans.name: Fikret

texts.en:
Fikret is 40 years old, married for 13 years. His family is from Fuzuli city and now live at Turkan village of the Abseron region. For 20 years Fikret’s family have been IDP (Internally Displaced Peoples) from their native land Fuzuli city. Fikret’s wife is a nurse. Fikret has a daughter and two sons. His daughter is 11 years old, she goes to fifth class. His elder son is 12, he goes to seventh class; his little son goes to primary school, he is 6 years old.

Fikret has been in farming business for 5 years. He grows pepper. Now he wants to plant aubergine too. Fikret has applied for a loan from Komak in the amount of 1,000 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). With this loan he wants to buy seedlings and seeds of aubergine. Fikret is thankful to Komak and Kiva for the loan. In the future he wants to build a big greenhouse.

loans.use: to plant aubergine

loans.name: Dilnoza

texts.ru: Дилноза умная и трудолюбивая женщина. Она родилась в 1985 года. Она разведена и одна воспитывает своих 2 детей. Ее дети еще маленькие, старшему 6 лет, а младшему 6 месяцев. Дилноза в 2007 году окончила Национальный Университет Таджикистана по специальности историка. Она более 6 лет работает в аэропорте диспечиром. Она постепенно улучшает условию проживания. Дилноза хочет купить кухонный и спальный гарнитура, так как она не имеет дома ни кухонного, ни спального гарнитура. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 долларов США для покупки кухонного и спального гарнитура. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Dilnoza is a smart and hardworking woman. She was born in 1985. She is now divorced and raising two children as a single mom. Her children are still small: the oldest is six years old and the youngest is only six months. 

Dilnoza graduated from the National University of Tajikistan in 2007 with a degree in history. For more than six years, she has worked as an air traffic controller. She is gradually improving her living conditions, and now wants to buy kitchen and bedroom furniture. She is asking for a loan of US$3,000 to buy a kitchen and bedroom set. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy kitchen and bedroom furniture.

loans.name: Muhammadjon

texts.ru: Мухаммадджон успешный студент 2 курса. Он учится в Экономическом Государственном Университете Таджикистана. Мухаммадчон учился успешно в средней школе. Он получал  хорошие и отличные оценки. Мухаммадчон любит такие предметы как математика, история, физика и английский язык. Мухаммадчон в университете является одним из успешных студентов. Он не женат и живет с родителями. Его мать занимается купле продажей женской одежды. Мухаммадчон должен оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 925 долларов США. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Muhammadjon is a successful second-year student at the Economic State University of Tajikistan. He successfully completed high school with good and excellent marks. Muhammadjon enjoys subjects like math, history, physics and the English language. He is one of the most successful students in college. 

He is single and lives with his parents; his mother sells women's clothing. He needs the money to pay for his tuition, and so is asking for a loan of US$925. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for his tuition.

loans.name: Hugo Adalberto

texts.es: Hugo, tiene 46 años de edad, esta casado, tiene tres hijos y vive en el municipio de Gracias, Lempira. Hace 6 años que se dedica a la venta de materiales de construcción como ser arena, graba, material selecto y otros. Esta actividad la realiza  según pedidos y los transporta en una volqueta. El préstamo que solicita es por 20,000 Lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de un repuesto (pistón)  para su volqueta. El espera reparar el vehículo de trabajo para prestar mejor servicio al cliente. Su meta es poder ahorrar para darles lo necesario a sus hijos.
texts.en: Hugo is 46 years old. He is married and has three children. He lives in the town of Gracias, Lempira. For six years he has been selling construction material such as sand, gravel, select materials, and other items. He delivers materials according to orders and he transports them in a dump truck. The loan that he is applying for is for 20,000 Lempiras, and he is going to invest it in the purchase of a part (a piston) for his dump truck. He expects to repair the vehicle to offer better service to his customers. His goal is to be able to save to give the necessities to his children.

loans.use: to buy a part (a piston) to repair his dump truck

loans.name: Allen

texts.en: Allen is a single lady aged 35 years from the town outskirts in Mbarara district. She got married at the early age of 16 years. They stayed together for some years and produced 4 children. Later the man became very violent to the extent he was beating her. Because of fear for her dear life she decided to divorce this man and she left with the children. Life became difficult as she had no source of income and she decided to start up piggery project with the loan of 1,000,000 she got from Ugafode. She later saved some money and built a house for her family. She is now requesting for a loan of 3,000,000 to complete her house. This will help her to accommodate her children and dependents comfortably.

loans.use: To buy building materials for her home

loans.name: Sadafmoh

texts.ru: Садафмох 35 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеем 2 детей. Ее дети совершеннолетние. Ее старшая дочь развелась с мужем и живет вместе с ней со своим маленьким ребенком. Ее муж Сухроб является трудовым мигрантом в Российской Федерации. Садафмох занимается предоставлением услуги няни, а также она делает уборки и стирки по запросу своих клиентов. Садафмох и ее муж упорно работают, но имеет маленький доход. Они несколько лет назад начали строительство дома, но так как они не имеют денег, не могут завершить строительства дома. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов как цемент, песок, кирпич и т.п. для стройки дома. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Sadafmoh is 35, married, and raising 2 young children.  Her oldest daughter is divorced, and lives with Sadafmoh along with her own child.  Sadafmoh works as a nanny for a living, sometimes doubling as a maid on request, while her husband, Sukhrob, is a migrant worker in the Russian Federation.  She and her husband are hard workers, but have little to show for it in the way of money.  A few years ago, they began building a new house, but weren't able to finish it due to a lack of money.  To finish building her home, Sadamof is requesting a loan of 10,000 somoni; specifically, she plans on using it to buy construction materials, such as cement, sand, bricks, etc., and is counting on your kindness and charity.

loans.use: buy building materials as cement, sand, and bricks for building a house.

loans.name: Charenc

texts.en:
Charenc lives in Gyumri town with his wife. Over 5 years, Charenc has been reselling fruits and vegetable in the local open market. From the rented area, he trades with different fruits and vegetables and gets income for his family. Since the family is very young, its costs are high and Charenc needs to work really hard for covering basic costs.

Now by asking for this loan, Charenc wants to purchase new stock of vegetables for reselling to the clients. He has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. The loan is very important for Charenc to be able to continue his selling business and be able to enlarge it in the future.

loans.use: to pay for new stock of vegetables for reselling

loans.name: Wilber

texts.en: Wilber is a farmer in a rural area in Burere in Buwheju District. He mainly grows tea, which he sells to provide the basic necessities for his children. He started farming in 2003, and has given it enough time to earn enough money from it. He started farming because he thought it was the only way to get money he needed, and growing tea was a cash crop that could grow in the area. He has applied for a loan of one million five hundred thousand shillings to buy fertilizers, so that the soil fertility can be boosted and give better yields. In addition to tea growing, Wilber has a small retail shop in the same area. That gives him additional income, which makes it a bit easier for him to raise funds to pay school dues for his children. However, the bad weather (rain), does not favor his tea and this reduces the quantity produced in a given period.  This decreases the profits, making it hard for him to supply the basic needs for his family members. Wilber strongly believes that by using the loan money to buy fertilizers to put in the tea garden, he will harvest much and will have more profits.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Esteban

texts.es:
Esteban es de la ciudad de Pilar, es comerciante, está casado tiene una hija, y comenta que tiene un local comercial en el donde comercializa productos de primera necesidad y otras, al por mayor y menor.
Gracias a que es muy bueno en las ventas ya tiene una gran clientela y además cuenta que se dedica al rubro hace más de  10 años, vive en casa propia que gracias a su trabajo pudo tener.
Es una persona  muy trabajadora y emprendedora y con un gran espíritu de superación.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos varios, como ser aceite, jabones, galletitas, suavizantes, y demás productos para seguir con sus ventas y dando a sus clientes lo que piden. Está agradecido por esta oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
Esteban is from the city of Pilar. He is a businessman. He is married and has a daughter, and he comments that he has a shop where he sells basic necessities and other products, wholesale and retail.

Thanks to the fact that he is very good at sales, he already has a large clientele, and he also comments that he has worked in this business for more than 10 years. He lives in his own house, which he was able to have thanks to his work.

He is a very hard-working and entrepreneurial person and has a great spirit to achieve.

He is applying for this loan to purchase various items such as oil, soaps, crackers, fabric softeners, and other products to continue with his sales and give his customers what they ask for. He is grateful for this opportunity that he is receiving.

loans.use: to buy oils, soaps, crackers, fabric softeners, and other items for his store

loans.name: Zuhurbek

texts.ru:
Этот мужчина дехканин. Его зовут Зухурбек. Он семейный человек в возрасте 40 лет. Зухурбек отец четверых детей. У него три дочери и один сын. Старшая дочь Зухурбека занимается кройкой и шитьем национальной одежды. Ей всего 16 лет, она настоящая мастерица и рукодельница. Ее родители гордятся ей. Другие дети еще маленькие и ходят в школу. Сам Зухурбек по профессии биохимик, но в течение 6 лет занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Зухурбек занимается посевом овощей рядом с домом. 
  На сегодняшний день у Зухурбека мало средств, чтобы приобрести минеральные удобрения и семян, чтобы посадить на зиму картошку и морковь. Поэтому он просит кредит. Зухурбек надеется, что ему помогут и он весной получить богатый урожай.
texts.en:
Zuhurbek is a farmer.  He is 40 years old, married, and the father of four children (three daughters and a son).  His oldest daughter, although only 16, already works as a seamstress, making traditional Tajik outfits.  She is extremely skilled in needlework, and her parents are very proud of her.  Zuhurbek's other children are young and still in school.

Zuhurbek is a biochemist by profession, but he has been involved in agriculture for the past six years.  He grows vegetables on a plot of land next to his house.

Zuhurbek currently has very little money, which makes it difficult to buy the mineral fertilizers and seeds he needs to plant potatoes and carrots for the winter.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan.  He hopes to receive some support, so that he can get a good harvest in the Spring.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and seeds in order to plant potatoes and carrots.

loans.name: Olimjon

texts.ru: Олимчон родился в 1994 года. Он хорошо воспитанный и целеустремленный молодой человек. Олимчон данное время является студентом 2 курса Национального Университета Таджикистана. Он учится в очное отделение. Олимчон учится в факультете Экономика и управление по специальности маркетинга. Он является одним из успешных студентов. Олимчон живет вместе родителями и сестрами. Их в семье 6 человек. Его родители не в состоянии оплатить за его учебный договор и поэтому Олимчон обратился за займом. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Olimjon was born in 1994.  He is well-mannered and goal-oriented young person.  Olimjon is currently a second-year student at the Tajikistan National University.  He is studying full-time.  He is studying marketing major in the economics and government department.  He is one of the most successful students.  Olimjon lives with his parents and sisters.  There are six people in his family.  His parents are unable to pay for his tuition and this is why Olimjon requested this loan.  He is requesting this loan to pay for his tuition.  He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for his university tuition

loans.name: Susana Evelyn

texts.en:
Susana sells plastic containers, pots, and bowls. She sells her items at Yabiw (near Takoradi).

She is divorced, with six children. As the sole breadwinner in the family, she uses her income to provide for the entire family. 

Susana will use the loan to purchase more containers, thus aiding her to increase sales. 

As a middle school graduate, Susana understands the importance of education in improving social conditions. Thus she plans to use the profits from her expanded enterprise to ensure that all her children remain in school and have a better standard of living.
